meta.title: Publications | Jacek Janczura
meta.description: Peer-reviewed publications, articles, and technical notes on AI architecture, distributed systems, and software engineering.

hero.title: Publications
hero.subtitle: Peer-reviewed research, articles, and technical insights

items.title: Saluki: Finding Taint-style Vulnerabilities with Static Property Checking
items.description: BAR/NDSS Workshop 2018. Research tool for detecting taint-style security properties in binary code using a mix of static and dynamic taint techniques. Provides a DSL for taint policies. Demonstrated on real programs.

items.title: DeCoCo: Blockchain-based Decentralized Compensation of Digital Content Purchases
items.description: IEEE BRAINS 2020. Blockchain-based decentralized compensation for digital content purchases with transparent, programmable payouts and smart-contract design.

items.title: Utility NFTs more than simple JPEGs?
items.description: Medium, Feb 1, 2023. Defines "utility NFTs" and argues for real-world utility beyond collectibles, with examples like access passes. Implications for marketplaces.

items.title: How to run your python code in KnowledgeX
items.description: Medium, Feb 17, 2022. Guide on running Python jobs on KnowledgeX via iExec and TEEs. Covers Dockerized templates, worker verification, and auditability for developers and data scientists.

notes.title: Technical Notes
notes.intro: Occasional technical notes and insights from working with AI systems, distributed architectures, and enterprise software. These are less formal than talks but capture important lessons and observations.

items.title: Prompt Engineering at Scale
items.excerpt: Building a prompt optimization system that scales across teams and maintains consistency in AI outputs. Lessons learned from implementing a "Prompt Wizard" for enterprise use cases.

items.title: Event-Driven AI Pipelines
items.excerpt: Designing resilient AI workflows using event-driven architecture patterns. How SQS/SNS can help manage AI pipeline backpressure and ensure reliable processing.

items.title: Multi-Model AI Routing
items.excerpt: Intelligent routing strategies for multi-model AI deployments. Cost optimization while maintaining performance and quality across different model providers.

items.title: Security for AI Platforms
items.excerpt: Essential security considerations for AI platforms: data privacy, access control, audit trails, and compliance automation in AI-first applications.

cta: These publications and notes represent ongoing learning and observations from building AI systems. For more structured content, check out the {talksLink} and {projectsLink} sections.
